title: 客户端崩溃，帮忙看一下报错。
author: 葉子の
txt_content:
---------------- Wurst Client Crash Report ----------------
---- Please report this crash at: wurst-client.tk/bugs ----
// This is a token for 1 free hug. Redeem at your nearest Mojangsta: [~~HUG~~]

Time: 17-5-30 上午12:34
Description: Initializing game

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: javax/vecmath/Vector3f
        at net.minecraft.client.renderer.block.model.ItemTransformVec3f$Deserializer.<clinit>(ItemTransformVec3f.java:31)

        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.startGame(Minecraft.java:506)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:358)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(Main.java:129)
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: javax.vecmath.Vector3f

好像是缺少一个支持库 vecmath
